title: "Generate music with an RNN"
excerpt: "This tutorial shows you how to generate musical notes using a simple RNN. You will train a model using a collection of piano MIDI files from the MAESTRO dataset. Given a sequence of notes, your model will learn to predict the next note in the sequence."
